Package Default

Class SmellyClass

java.lang.Object
Default.SmellyClass
public class SmellyClass
extends java.lang.Object
Everything related to the detection of code smells
Author:
G7 de ES LEI 2020/2021

    • NOM

      public void NOM​(java.io.BufferedReader file)
      Saves the number of methods in a given class to the "method" class attribute.
      Parameters:
      file - The class to be evaluated

    • WMC

      public void WMC​(java.io.BufferedReader file)
      Saves the cyclomatic complexity of the class given to the "wmcCount" class attribute
      Parameters:
      file - The class to be evaluated

    • LOC_Method

      public void LOC_Method​(java.io.BufferedReader file)
      Saves to the "linesPerMethod" class attribute the number of lines in each method of the given class.
      Parameters:
      file - The class to be evaluated

    • CYCLO_Method

      public void CYCLO_Method​(java.io.BufferedReader file)
      Saves to the "cyclosPerMethod" class attribute the cyclomatic complexity of each method in the class given as the parameter.
      Parameters:
      file - The class that will have its methods be evaluated

    • isGodClass

      public boolean isGodClass​(int wmcThreshold, int nomThreshold, int locThreshold, boolean wmc, boolean nom, boolean loc, boolean isOr, boolean isOrAgain)
      Checks if a class is a God Class by comparing the thresholds in the parameters with the rest of the values in the parameters.
      Parameters:
      wmcThreshold - Cyclomatic complexity threshold
      nomThreshold - Number of methods threshold
      locThreshold - Lines of code threshold
      wmc - True if it is to be checked by the cyclomatic completity
      nom - True if it is to be checked by the number of methods
      loc - True if it is to be checked by the lines of code
      isOr - True means "and", false means "or"
      isOrAgain - True means "and", false means "or"
      Returns:
      True if it is a God Class, false if otherwise

    • isLongMethod

      public void isLongMethod​(int locTreshold, int cycloTreshold, boolean loc, boolean cyclo, boolean isOr)
      Saves to the "areLongMethods" class attribute if a method is long by comparing the thresholds given in the parameters with the method numbers in "loc" and "cyclo"
      Parameters:
      locTreshold - Line of code threshold
      cycloTreshold - Cyclomatic complexity threshold
      loc - Lines of code to compare
      cyclo - Cyclomatic complexity to compare
      isOr - True means "and", false means "or"
